locker.name: Locker
locker.desc: It probably holds some neat stuff!

portable_oxygen_tank.name: Portable Oxygen Tank
portable_oxygen_tank.desc: Useful for resupplying spacesuits and medical equipment.

oxygenator.name: Oxygenator
oxygenator.desc: A powerful Oxygen generator. Capable of servicing the oxygen needs for over three hundred people!

blue_keycard_reader.name: Blue Keycard Reader
blue_keycard_reader.desc: You probably need a blue-coloured keycard.

red_keycard_reader.name: Red Keycard Reader
red_keycard_reader.desc: You probably need a red-coloured keycard.

red_keycard.name: Red Keycard
red_keycard.desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a red-coloured reader.

green_keycard_reader.name: Green Keycard Reader
green_keycard_reader.desc: You probably need a green-coloured keycard.

green_keycard.name: Green Keycard
green_keycard.desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a green-coloured reader.

admirals_log.name: Admiral's Log
admirals_log.desc: It is dated for three hours ago.

wrench.name: Wrench
wrench.desc: Standard-issue engineering wrench. Useful for tightening (or loosening) stubborn bolts.

magazine.name: Magazine
magazine.desc: A copy of Engineering Monthly, Issue #211. This month's articles include pointers on maintaining starliner engines, tips on how to impress non-Engineering colleagues without boring them, and 34 hacks on how to hack hack hackers hacking hackable hacksaws. Fascinating stuff.

hull_debris.name: Hull Debris
hull_debris.desc: A large chunk of the ship's hull. It probably shouldn't be there.

twisted_metal.name: Twisted Metal
twisted_metal.desc: A huge twisted steel girder. While the flames didn't melt it, it appears that non-uniform thermally-induced stress upon the girder created a concentrated axial compressive load causing sudden structural deformation resulting in a loss of structural stability in the whole room, or something. You're not an engineer.

melted_wiring.name: Melted Wiring
melted_wiring.desc: A bunch of plenum wiring that has melted and clumped together. Useless to all but the most desperate of scrapper.

molten_slag.name: Molten Slag
molten_slag.desc: Ouch! This stuff is still red hot!

macgfn_control_panel.name: MACGFN Control Panel
macgfn_control_panel.desc: This panel controls all of MAC-GFN's primary functionality. It has an insert slot for an AI Matrix.
